医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Donanemab 可能为早期阿尔茨海默病患者带来新希望礼来公司今天报告的 TRAILBLAZER-ALZ 2 多南单抗治疗早期症状性阿尔茨海默病临床试验的数据证明了阿尔茨海默病研究和治疗的重要进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Donanemab-may-offer-new-hope-for-people-with-early-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Donanemab-may-offer-new-hope-for-people-with-early-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f4e2612-97bf-4ebe-a7ab-16a81a9b2fad Mon, 17 Jul 2023 13:44:30 -0400 Donanemab may offer new hope for people with early Alzheimer's disease
嗅觉狗可能是检测 COVID-19 的更便宜、更快和更有效的方法对最近研究的一项新综述表明，嗅觉狗可能代表了一种更便宜、更快速、更有效的检测 COVID-19 的方法，并且可能成为未来流行病的关键工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Scent-dogs-may-be-a-cheaper-faster-and-more- effective-way-to-detect-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Scent-dogs-may-be-a-cheaper-faster-and-more- effective-way-to-detect-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b16d0a9-e129-4b7e-833c-63c3634bd775 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 13:36:11 -0400 Scent dogs may be a cheaper, faster and more effective way to detect COVID-19
PALACE研究：直接口服挑战可以安全去除青霉素过敏标签在美国，青霉素过敏影响着超过 2500 万人（高达十分之一的美国人），并且已被证明会导致孕妇和手术患者的健康结果尤其糟糕。它也是一种公共卫生威胁，导致住院患者出现抗生素耐药性和感染，从而危及生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/PALACE-study-Direct-oral-challenge-can-safely-remove-penicillin-allergy-label.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/PALACE-study-Direct-oral-challenge-can-safely-remove-penicillin-allergy-label.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66b5a3a2-7560-4f2b-9223-b7f1b9c2e18d Mon, 17 Jul 2023 13:29:52 -0400 PALACE study: Direct oral challenge can safely remove penicillin allergy label
COVID-19 疫苗挽救了长期护理中患有痴呆症的老年人的生命加州大学旧金山分校领导的一项新研究显示，在接种 COVID-19 疫苗后，疗养院和长期护理中心的痴呆症老年人死亡率大幅下降，但在家中的老年人死亡率仍然很高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/COVID-19-vaccines-saved-lives-of-older-adults-with-dementia-in-long-term-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/COVID-19-vaccines-saved-lives-of-older-adults-with-dementia-in-long-term-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f47bb47f-6e99-4c37-9d42-2bce0dd7ddec Mon, 17 Jul 2023 13:10:59 -0400 COVID-19 vaccines saved lives of older adults with dementia in long-term care
格里菲斯大学研究人员开发出控制病毒组装的新方法格里菲斯大学的研究人员在利用 DNA“折纸”模板控制病毒组装方式方面发挥了关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Griffith-University-researchers-develop-new-method-to-control-virus- assembly.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Griffith-University-researchers-develop-new-method-to-control-virus- assembly.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb66123c-58db-46c9-89cf-596e63af67ef Mon, 17 Jul 2023 12:54:59 -0400 Griffith University researchers develop new method to control virus assembly
研究强调细胞替代疗法治疗亨廷顿舞蹈病的潜力发表在《自然生物技术》杂志上的新研究回答了有关用健康细胞替代中枢神经系统中患病和衰老细胞的治疗方法的可行性的重要问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Study-highlights-the-potential-of-cell-replacement-therapy-for-Huntingtons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Study-highlights-the-potential-of-cell-replacement-therapy-for-Huntingtons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d244d3d3-2732-4671-93f6-9b580fbbe5a3 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 12:35:48 -0400 Study highlights the potential of cell replacement therapy for Huntington's disease
伯克利实验室和基因泰克合作开发用于药物输送的新型脂质纳米颗粒许多疾病可以在细胞培养皿的简单环境中成功治疗，但为了成功治疗真人，药物必须穿越我们体内无限复杂的环境，并完好无损地到达受影响的细胞内。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Berkeley-Lab-and-Genentech-collaborate-to-develop-new-lipid-nanoarticles-for-drug-delivery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Berkeley-Lab-and-Genentech-collaborate-to-develop-new-lipid-nanoarticles-for-drug-delivery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16764034-3ca1-4310-8ad8-4a6522bdba48 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 12:12:28 -0400 Berkeley Lab and Genentech collaborate to develop new lipid nanoparticles for drug delivery
Donanemab 有望减缓阿尔茨海默病随着第三种新的阿尔茨海默氏症药物预计将获得美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 的批准，该领域在减缓该疾病的斗争中开始显示出进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Donanemab-shows-promise-in-slowing-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Donanemab-shows-promise-in-slowing-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2afd0b66-9fef-4380-9be5-ef25773fe91c Mon, 17 Jul 2023 12:00:11 -0400 Donanemab shows promise in slowing Alzheimer's disease
研究发现脑震荡不会影响儿童智商当孩子受伤时，父母感到的焦虑无疑是为人父母的普遍状况之一。当这些伤害涉及脑震荡时，这种焦虑会大大加剧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Concussions-do-not-affect-IQ-in-children-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Concussions-do-not-affect-IQ-in-children-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dcd0587c-9e4a-4e3a-bb66-4a27227c79a6 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 11:55:04 -0400 Concussions do not affect IQ in children, study finds
三管齐下的联合免疫疗法为胰腺癌患者带来了希望为可手术的胰腺癌患者提供三管齐下的联合免疫疗法，包括胰腺癌疫苗GVAX、免疫检查点疗法nivolumab和抗CD137激动剂抗体urelemab疗法，是安全的，它增加了抗癌免疫系统的数量根据约翰·霍普金斯大学研究人员指导的新研究，肿瘤中的 T 细胞在癌症切除手术前两周注射似乎有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Three-pronged-combination-immunotherapy-shows-promise-for-pancreatic-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Three-pronged-combination-immunotherapy-shows-promise-for-pancreatic-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc8778b0-8187-4bdf-a7f3-cfdab842973c Mon, 17 Jul 2023 11:50:44 -0400 Three-pronged combination immunotherapy shows promise for pancreatic cancer patients
